moreBlocks.otherOffices: Tyner Law Offices (Main Office) 9 Fletcher Street, Suite B Chelmsford, MA 01824 (978) 710-6011

description:
Here at Tyner Law Offices in Nashua, New Hampshire, we are fully prepared to help you secure the full amount of compensation and benefits you deserve following a debilitating work injury or an injury or loss caused by someone else's negligence. Serving clients throughout Middlesex County, the Merrimack Valley and all across our region, attorney Michael Tyner has more than 35 years of experience advocating on behalf of those in need.

Our law firm has become one of the area's most trusted sources for quality, effective representation for those who have legal needs involving any of the following:

• Workers' compensation
• Personal injury
• Social Security Disability
• Accidental disability retirement claims

We fully understand how complex and confusing the process can be to obtain your rightful entitlements. This is why we promise to sit with you and discuss your options so that you can face your legal challenge with confidence. We will then set about implementing the best plan toward increasing your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation possible, whether that involves fighting for you in court or negotiating favorable terms with the insurance companies.

From this high level of client commitment, we have achieved considerable success helping our clients recover the finances they need to support themselves and their families, and our law firm has received many positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients. To find out what all we can do for you and your family, you can contact Tyner Law Offices by phone or through our website to schedule a free initial consultation, and we will not require a fee from you unless we win your case.
